title: AI's Energy Demands Are Out of Control. Welcome to the Internet's Hyper-Consumption Era
summary: Generative artificial intelligence tools, now part of the everyday user experience online, are causing stress on local power grids and mass water evaporation . An AI-generated summary may randomly appear at the top of the results whenever you do a Google search .

title: Dating App That Tried to Use AI and Dick Pics to Screen for STDs Gets Shut Down
summary: Dating App that tried to use AI and Dick Pics to Screen for STDs gets shut down . Federal Trade Commission shut it down after FTC caught wind of the app .

title: SheerLuxe defends use of AI influencer
summary: SheerLuxe defends use of AI influencer as a "new member" of the team . The lifestyle magazine has been criticised after it described an artificial intelligence (AI) "fashion editor" on its social media page .

title: OpenAI Touts New AI Safety Research. Critics Say It’s a Good Step, but Not Enough
summary: OpenAI announced a new technique to make the workings of its systems more transparent . People familiar with OpenAI say more oversight is needed . OpenAI has faced opprobrium in recent months from those who suggest it may be rushing too quickly and recklessly .

title: Meta Is Changing Artificial Intelligence Labels After Real Photos Were Marked As AI
summary: Meta is changing the labels it applies to social media posts suspected to have been generated in some way with artificial intelligence tools . The Facebook, Instagram, Threads and WhatsApp parent comp…

title: Apple's artificial intelligence features to be delayed, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Apple's artificial intelligence features to be delayed, Bloomberg News reports . iPhone maker is planning to begin rolling out Apple Intelligence to customers as part of software updates coming by October .

title: Google wants to use music to train AI models, but record labels should push back
summary: Google wants to use music to train AI models, but record labels should push back . Google is in talks with record labels about paying for access to music for “other experiments” using AI .

title: 'Body Electric': If a bot relationship feels real, should we care that it's not?
summary: If a bot relationship feels real, should we care that it's not? Experts say friendships can be good for health . What are the implications if those relationships are fabricated by artificial intelligence?

title: Disney’s Internal Slack Messages Reportedly Leak in 1 Terabyte Tranche From Hacktivists
summary: A cybercriminal claims to have leaked a large tranche of corporate data stolen from Disney . The supposed 1.1 terabyte data haul includes a large number of internal Slack messages . The threat actor behind the alleged breach claims it is a "hacktivist" group .

title: Apple denies using YouTube content to train Apple Intelligence
summary: Apple denies using an unethically collected dataset from EleutherAI to train its flagship artificial intelligence (AI) product, Apple Intelligence . However, they state they have used the dataset .
